Class Controler2D

java.lang.Object
controler.AbstractControler
vista2D.ui.Controler2D
All Implemented Interfaces:
KVEventListener
public class Controler2D extends AbstractControler implements KVEventListener
Clase Controlador de la UI inicial del juego (patron MVC)
Author:
Guillermo Lazzurri

    • eventFired

      public void eventFired(int eventCode, Object param)
      Description copied from interface: KVEventListener
      Metodo llamado cuando sucede un evento durante el juego
      Specified by:
      eventFired in interface KVEventListener
      Parameters:
      eventCode - codigo numerico que indica el evento disparado
      Puede tomar los valores:
      int ENTERING_LEVEL = 0;
      int ENTER_LEVEL = 1;
      int EXITING_LEVEL = 2;
      int EXIT_LEVEL = 3;
      int THROW_DAGGER = 5;
      int ENTER_GIRATORY = 6;
      int EXIT_GIRATORY = 7;
      int ACTIVATE_TRAP = 8;
      int TRAP_END_DOWN = 9;
      int CHARACTER_JUMP=10;
      int CHARACTER_END_JUMP=11;
      int CHARACTER_BEGIN_FALL = 12;
      int CHARACTER_END_FALL = 13;
      int CHARACTER_ENTER_STAIR=14;
      int CHARACTER_EXIT_STAIR=15;
      int PLAYER_DIE = 16;
      int PLAYER_PICKING = 17;
      int PLAYER_RESPAWN = 18;
      int PLAYER_JUMP = 19;
      int MUMMY_APPEAR = 20;
      int MUMMY_DIE = 21;
      int MUMMY_KILLED_BY_SWORD = 22;
      int MUMMY_JUMP=23;
      int ADD_EXTRA_LIFE = 40;
      int PICKUP_JEWEL = 51;
      int PICKUP_DAGGER = 52;
      int PICKUP_PICKER = 53;
      int PICKUP_ALL_JEWEL = 54;
      int OPENING_DOOR = 60;
      int CLOSING_DOOR = 61;
      int SWORD_STUCK = 70;
      int SWORD_CLASH = 71;
      int SWORD_CLASH_FLESH = 72;
      int PAUSED_IS_CHANGED = 80;
      int FINISH_ALL_LEVELS = 100;
      int GAME_OVER = 200;
      int GAME_ENDING = 201;
      param - parametro extra, dependiendo el tipo de evento debera castearse a la clase correspondiente
